Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{3: 'Alpha sees an enormous frozen lake on the other side of the hill she just climbed.'}
{3: 'They traversed the frozen lake, apparently so that their tracks would be covered by snow. Little did they know, however, that Alpha would catch up so quickly.'}

{3: "Having ascertained the rioters' escape route, Alpha gives her motorcycle's throttle a hard twist. With a blaring vroom, the red motorcycle skids through the air, leaving a staggering trail before stopping squarely by the lake."}
{3: 'Over on the other side of this lake is where this hide-and-seek comes to an end.'}
{3: 'The motorcycle has left a white tire mark in its wake over the frozen lake. Right when Alpha is ready the press ahead, however, the thick smoke spreading across the sky captures her attention.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Alpha', 3: 'What in the world is that...', 4: '1'}
{3: "Alpha's squint quickly turns into a frown."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "That's... where the next conservation area is.", 4: '1'}
{3: "And if she's correct... 【kuroname】 is headed over that way with a group of people from the last conservation area."}
{3: 'Did something happen to them?'}

{3: "Alpha, however, wouldn't be surprised even if that's the case—with resources difficult to come by in this land of snow, anyone who decides to travel around makes themselves an easy target to all of the rioters and Scavengers around."}
{3: "【kuroname】 is definitely no stranger to when it comes to dealing with such incidents—and Alpha hopes they won't let it stall them for far too long."}
{3: "Knowing 【kuroname】, however, Alpha can almost be sure that they'll probably just tough it out, no matter what happens."}
{3: 'Once again, Alpha connects herself to the channel.'}
{3: "Caught up in the middle of an argument, however, 【kuroname】 doesn't even have a moment to react to the sudden Mind Beacon overload."}
{3: 'It sounds like a heated argument—one where someone accuses 【kuroname】 of abusing the rights as a commandant, while another accuses someone else of stealing resources.'}
{2: 'Crowe', 3: 'Commandant 【kuroname】 was already slightly infected on our way here! And Commandant 【kuroname】 got the serums directly from Babylonia!'}
{2: 'Crowe', 3: "And don't even get me started with the food..."}
{3: "The Construct that came down with 【kuroname】 is apparently trying to reason with the crowd—except they aren't buying it, stating that the resources were rightfully theirs to begin with."}
{3: 'Save for the occasional whispers, the crowd has fallen completely silent. Alpha can almost picture the apathetic looks on their faces.'}
{3: 'Before she knows it, the people on the other side of the channel start quarreling again. Hearing the quarrel coming through the channel, Alpha turns her face away in disgust.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'No amount of arguing and explaining is going to do anyone any good...'}
{3: "Because it's only with power that one can earn the right to talk."}
{3: 'As the fight on the other side of the channel continues, Alpha gazes off into the distance, her eyes cold.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory96.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Crowe', 3: "C'mon, guys, we're almost there...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'citizen A', 3: 'Don\'t "c\'mon" me! I don\'t care who you people are, but if you\'re going to take our food and medicines, you\'ll have to do it over our dead bodies!', 4: '1'}
{2: "Crowe, it's fine.", 3: '39'}
{2: 'I understand how you all must be feeling, but rest assured that the situation is being dealt with as we speak.', 3: '40'}
{2: "I've asked Babylonia to send more resources our way, and my squad will personally see to it that it's done.", 3: '41'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Tsk.'}
{2: 'But before the resources arrive, rest assured that you will enjoy unimpeded access to the resources we have remaining. Now, Crowe...', 3: '43'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: '"The resources we have remaining," huh? Let\'s just wait and see how long they\'re going to last these people.'}
{2: 'Can you go ahead and bring out the resources we have left from before?', 3: '45'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Pathetic, like I thought.'}
{2: 'Hand them out to the infected elders and kids.', 3: '47'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Throwing your own life away like it doesn't matter now, huh?"}
{2: "I'll just hang in there until we reach the next conservation area.", 3: '49'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'So the next conservation area holds what you came to look for, huh?'}
{2: "And if need be, I'll escort you all to the next conservation before I head down to my next assignment location.", 3: '51'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Playing it safe, huh?'}
{2: 'Rest assured that every single one of us here will make it to the next conservation area safe and sound.', 3: '53'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'And playing it safe is all you ever do. Pathetic, absolutely pathetic...'}
{2: 'And hopefully...', 3: '55'}
{2: 'What happened today will not happen again.', 3: '56'}
{1: '1', 2: 'citizen A', 3: '...What do you mean?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Well, this is what you were going around "collecting" just now...', 3: '59'}
{3: 'You pick up a pack of food and hand it over to one of the citizens.'}
{2: 'Is this yours?', 3: '61'}
{1: '1', 2: 'citizen B', 3: "Of course! It's even got our conservation area's logo printed on it, except we found it in your tent!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'You whip out your portable infrared scanner and train it straight at the pack of food.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'citizen A', 3: 'What are you...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'In the infrared light, the packet—which until moments ago had nothing on it—now carries a green line of letters.'}
{2: "This is Babylonia's watermark.", 3: '69'}
{2: 'And this number here is the date this item was dropped.', 3: '70'}
{2: 'And this date came after the date on which the conservation area went under attack.', 3: '71'}
{2: 'citizen A', 3: 'Why, you...', 4: '1'}
{2: "And if you allow us to have a quick look into your bag, I'm sure we can find more of it in there.", 3: '73'}
{3: 'With it, the guy falls silent, his face having paled. He turns around to look at the other guy—who, despite his absolute attitude just moments ago, is now hiding behind the crowd.'}
{2: 'Well, enough said, I guess.', 3: '76'}
{2: "I'm not going to spell out the name of the person that did this.", 3: '77'}
{2: "But whatever you've done before...", 3: '78'}
{2: "I just want you to know that you don't need to do this anymore.", 3: '79'}
{2: "Because I'll do everything in my power to make sure the resources are fairly distributed.", 3: '80'}
{2: 'citizen A', 3: "...Tsk. Whatchu all lookin' at? Bounce already!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Says the man as he elbows his way through the crowd.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Taking a step forward, Crowe stands in the man's way."}
{2: 'I hope we can keep in mind that...', 3: '87'}
{2: "The fact that we're here means that there is order to be observed.", 3: '88'}
{2: 'And when there is order to be observed, there are prices to be paid for theft.', 3: '89'}
{2: 'Can you tally up the resources again?', 3: '92'}
{2: 'Crowe', 3: 'Of course.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'With the commotion dying down, Alpha hears a sigh of relief from the other side of the channel.'}
{3: 'Done ordering their team to look into the theft, 【kuroname】 proceeds to give away part of their food and immunity serums to "those in need."'}
{3: 'Crowe said 【kuroname】 was slightly infected—which Alpha believes is why she had no difficulty connecting to 【kuroname】.'}
{2: 'Eavesdropping much?', 3: '100'}
{3: 'Hearing the question, Alpha comes back to her senses.'}
{2: 'What exactly do you want?', 3: '102'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Gotta say you did a wonderful job threatening those people back there.', 4: '1'}
{2: "I wouldn't call that a threat, though.", 3: '104', 4: "They've crossed the line a few times already.", 5: '104'}
{2: 'I was just trying to be quick and efficient.', 3: '105'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Quick and efficient, huh? I totally thought you'd bombard them with a tear-jerker of a speech, though.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'And I thought you\'d end the speech by saying something like, "See, they did what they did because they felt insecure, but I\'m sure they won\'t do it again now with secure access to resources."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Do you need help?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'What is that?', 3: '110'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You heard me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You should be more than what you are now, and I can make that happen for you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'So become an Ascendant and walk the path less traveled with me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Where you won't have to muddle with those clowns over those petty little things.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Thanks but no thanks.', 3: '115'}
{3: 'Having seen the rejection coming, Alpha tightens her grip and turns the throttle, causing the engine to vroom idly.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "...What's the point of it, though?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Whatever you do, it's not going to curb their greed.", 4: '1'}
{2: "Well, I'm thinking about what you just said, and...", 3: '120'}
{2: "I think you're right—for saying that they were just feeling insecure.", 3: '121'}
{3: 'Humanity is but paper-thin when doomsday stares one in the face.'}
{3: 'People just need shelter and food to keep their heads above water.'}
{3: "There is no fast way to go about saving all these people. It's just going to take time."}
{3: 'Hearing what 【kuroname】 has just said, Alpha is awash with calmness.'}
{3: 'Bright as it is, this fire deserves to be at a place—one from which it can burn brighter still and bless the world with its light and warmth.'}
{3: "Alpha wonders if she would have been able to convert 【kuroname】 had they crossed each other's paths even earlier..."}
{3: "Which she understands is a question she'll never be able to figure out."}
{3: 'Because there is no going back in time, and she and 【kuroname】 are bound to go their separate ways.'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "And that's why you gave your own resources away, huh?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Changing the topic, Alpha lets out a cold chuckle as she recalls what 【kuroname】 has done.'}
{3: "If Alpha's memory serves her right, 【kuroname】 keeps less than a day's worth of food—on top of giving away all the serum, that is."}
{2: 'That was just a temporary measure.', 3: '136'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Uh-huh, one without a plan B, right?', 4: '1'}
{2: "We're fast approaching the next conservation area here.", 3: '138'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Well, you'd better hope you don't starve to death before you get there—or else you'll see me before you die.", 4: '1'}
{2: "I gather you're close by, then?", 3: '140'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Take a guess.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With the iffy remark, Alpha gives the throttle another twist.'}
{3: "In a loud vroom, the motorcycle blasts up snowflakes and white dust into the air, erasing Alpha's voice."}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Show me whatchu got, then...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Alpha, for one, wants to see what comes out of whatever 【kuroname】 is trying to do.'}
{3: 'Alpha decides to keep the channel alive.'}
